devdoc.details: Notice that this contract is inheriting from AccessControlAppStorageEnumerable721

params.end: Contains the last NFT of the range collection
params.lockedTokens: Contains all the NFT tokens in the range that are unavailable for sell
params.name: Contains the name for the created NFT collection range
params.price: Contains the selling price for the range of NFT
params.productIndex: Contains the position where the product was indexed
params.rangeIndex: Contains the position where the range was indexed
params.start: Contains the start position of the range of nft collection
params.tokensAllowed: Contains all the allowed NFT tokens in the range that are available for sell

params.from: Contains the starting NFT of the range that we want to lock
params.lockedTokens: Contains all the NFT tokens in the range that are unavailable for sell
params.rangeIndex: Contains the position where the range was indexed
params.to: Contains the last NFT of the range that we want to lock

params.from: Contains the starting NFT of the range that we want to lock
params.rangeIndex: Contains the position where the range was indexed
params.to: Contains the last NFT of the range that we want to lock

params.lockedTokens: Contains all the NFT tokens in the range that are unavailable for sell
params.name: Contains the name for the created NFT collection range
params.price: Contains the selling price for the range of NFT
params.rangeIndex: Contains the position where the range was indexed
params.tokensAllowed: Contains all the allowed NFT tokens in the range that are available for sell

params.productId_: Contains the identification for the product
params.rangeEnd_: Contains the tentative NFT to use as ending point of the range
params.rangeStart_: Contains the tentative NFT to use as starting point of the range

returns._0: bool With the answer if the range cant be creater or not

createRange(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.details: This function is only available to an account with a `CREATOR` roleThis function require thar the collection ID match a valid collection

params.collectionId: Contains the identification for the product
params.lockedTokens: Contains all the NFT tokens in the range that are unavailable for sell
params.name: Contains the name for the created NFT collection range
params.price: Contains the selling price for the range of NFT
params.rangeLength: Number of tokens contained in the range
params.tokensAllowed: Contains all the allowed NFT tokens in the range that are available for sell

createRangeBatch(uint256,(uint256,uint25.details: This function is only available to an account with a `CREATOR` roleThis function require thar the collection ID match a valid collection

params.collectionId: Contains the identification for the product
params.data: An array with the data for all the ranges that we want to implement

params.role: Contains the role that we want to verify

returns._0: bytes that indicates if an account has or not an admin role

params.index: Contains the indexed position to verify inside the role members list
params.role: Contains the role that we want to verify

returns._0: address that indicates the address indexed in that position

params.role: Contains the role that we want to verify

returns._0: uint256 that indicates the total accounts with that role

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: This function is only available to an account with an Admin role

params.account: Contains the account that has the role we want to update
params.role: Contains the role that we want to grant

params.account: Contains the account address thay we want to verify
params.role: Contains the role that we want to verify

returns._0: bool that indicates if an account has or not a role

isRangeLocked(uint256).details: This function requires that the rangeIndex_ points to an existing range

params.rangeId: Identification of the range to verify

returns._0: bool with the current status of the range lock			true for lock and false for unlocked

params.collectionId: Index of the product to verify
params.rangeIndex: Index of the range to verify

rangeInfo(uint256).details: This function requires that the rangeIndex_ points to an existing range

params.rangeId: Identification of the range to verify

returns.productIndex: Contains the index of the product in the range

rangeToProduct(uint256).details: This function requires that the rangeIndex_ points to an existing range

params.rangeIndex_: Identification of the range to verify

returns._0: uint which indicates the index of the product

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Currently you can only renounce to your own roles

params.account: Contains the account that has the role we want to update
params.role: Contains the role to remove from our account

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: This function is only available to an account with an Admin role

params.account: Contains the account that has the role we want to update
params.role: Contains the role that we want to revoke

updateRange(uint256,string,uint256,uint2.details: This function requires that the rangeIndex_ points to an existing rangeThis function is only available to an account with a `CREATOR` role

params.lockedTokens_: Contains all the NFT tokens in the range that are unavailable for sell
params.name: Contains the name for the created NFT collection range
params.price_: Contains the selling price for the range of NFT
params.rangeId: Identification of the range to verify
params.tokensAllowed_: Contains all the allowed NFT tokens in the range that are available for sell

devdoc.title: This is contract to manage the Rair token ranges facet

CreatedRange(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: This event stores in the blockchain when the NFT range is correctly created

RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32.notice: This event stores in the blockchain when we change an admin role

RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address).notice: This event stores in the blockchain when we grant a role

RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address).notice: This event stores in the blockchain when we revoke a role

TradingLocked(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: This event stores in the blockchain when the NFT range trading is effectively locked

TradingUnlocked(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: This event stores in the blockchain when the NFT range trading is effectively unlocked

UpdatedRange(uint256,string,uint256,uint.notice: This event stores in the blockchain when the NFT range is correctly updated

canCreateRange(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: This functions allow us to know if a desidred range can be created or not

createRange(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: This function that will create the NFT range if the requirements are meet

createRangeBatch(uint256,(uint256,uint25.notice: This function will create as many ranges as the data array requires

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).notice: Allow us to check the admin role that contains a role

getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allow us to check the address of an indexed position for the role list

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).notice: Allow us to check total members that has an selected role

grantRole(bytes32,address).notice: Allow us to grant a role to an account

hasRole(bytes32,address).notice: Allow us to check the if and account has a selected role

isRangeLocked(uint256).notice: This functions shows is the range is currently locked or not

productRangeInfo(uint256,uint256).notice: This functions shows the information for the range of a product

rangeInfo(uint256).notice: This functions allow us to check the information of the range

rangeToProduct(uint256).notice: This functions return us the product that containt the selected range

renounceRole(bytes32,address).notice: Allow us to renounce to a role

revokeRole(bytes32,address).notice: Allow us to revoke a role to an account

updateRange(uint256,string,uint256,uint2.notice: This functions allow us to update the information about a range

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to administrate ranges, transfers & minting of the tokens
